Package com.refinedmods.refinedstorage2.api.storage.tracked

Interface TrackedStorage<T>

All Superinterfaces:
ExtractableStorage<T>, InsertableStorage<T>, Storage<T>, StorageView<T>
All Known Subinterfaces:
CompositeStorage<T>, FuzzyStorageChannel<T>, StorageChannel<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
CompositeStorageImpl, FuzzyStorageChannelImpl, StorageChannelImpl, TrackedStorageImpl
@API(status=STABLE, since="2.0.0-milestone.1.4") public interface TrackedStorage<T> extends Storage<T>
A storage that is able to track resources being modified.

    • findTrackedResourceByActorType

      Optional<TrackedResource> findTrackedResourceByActorType(T resource, Class<? extends Actor> actorType)
      Finds the tracked resource by actor type.
